short_description: This function creates a generalized linear model.
long_description: This function does linear regression model. GLM is an extension of the linear regression model that enables the linear equation to be related to the dependent variables by a link function.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queenâ€™s IP saddress or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: InputTable
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the columns of the input table that contain the response and predictors like Y,X1,X2,...,Xp.

argument_clauses.name: Family
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the distribution exponential family. The permitted input values are [LOGISTIC, BINOMIAL, POISSON, GAUSSIAN, GAMMA, INVERSE_GAUSSIAN, NEGATIVE_BINOMIAL]. The default value is BINOMIAL.

argument_clauses.name: Link
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the canonical link functions. The permitted input values are [CANONICAL, IDENTITY, INVERSE, LOG, COMPLEMENTARY_LOG_LOG, SQUARE_ROOT, INVERSE_MU_SQUARED, LOGIT, PROBIT, CAUCHIT]. The default value is CANONICAL.

argument_clauses.name: Weight
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of an input table column that contains the weights to assign to responses. The default value is 1.0.

argument_clauses.name: Threshold
argument_clauses.description: Specify the convergence threshold. The default value is 0.01.

argument_clauses.name: MaxIterNum
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the maximum number of steps the function executes before quitting if the convergence threshold has not been met. The input value must be greater than 0. The default value is 25.

argument_clauses.name: Intercept
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether an intercept is included in the model. The default value is true.

argument_clauses.name: Step
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether the function runs stepwise glm. The default value is false.
